description: Shouta`s Shugo Chara. He wears a beret and has the appearance of a painter. Kuuta was born from Shouta`s dream of becoming an artist, but due to Shouta`s misfortunes he has been fading away. Kuuta causes various disturbances around the abandoned house to get Shouta`s attention, which spawns the rumor of the house being haunted. In the end, Kuuta becomes a X Chara, but he is healed by Amu and returns to Shouta`s heart.
name: Kuuta
